  proposition: Research paper by Dawei Li et al. explores dynamic co-augmentation of large language models and knowledge graphs for Alzheimer's disease questions.
    entity-attribute relationships:

    entity-attribute relationships:

    entity-attribute relationships:

  proposition: Elias Stengel-Eskin et al. researched teaching models to balance resisting and accepting persuasion.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Elias Stengel-Eskin|RESEARCHED|Model Persuasion

  proposition: Philippe Laban et al. challenged LLMs, leading to performance drops in the flipflop experiment.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Philippe Laban|CONDUCTED|Flipflop Experiment
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Philippe Laban|CHALLENGED|Large Language Models
